text: 11.28 Apo 21.10 Apel, God Kawnan ak bɨ kɨli Agabus nop gos ñek, ne tɨkjakɨl agak, Yuwan awl yɨbɨl ak, man awl mɨdupsek gɨnɨgeb agak. Agek, agak tek yuwan awl yɨbɨl ak, kɨdek Lom gapman bɨnonɨm11.28 Lom binɨb okok, kɨli gapman bɨnonɨm kɨli okok mɨdupsek kɨlop Sisal agelɨgɨpal. Klodiyus kod yolɨgup ñɨn ak owak.
